- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;

Block bad website “sharecuts.cn”

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, Fanboy's Social Blocking List, Web Annoyances Ultralist, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, NoCoin Filter List ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. comment.body:
Hello @AdSlayer, thank you very much for your help.
The issue is caused by the rule `||editions-eni.fr/dlg/cookies.aspx` from Fanboy's Annoyances, please add to user rules:

```
@@||editions-eni.fr/dlg/cookies.aspx
editions-eni.fr###CkC
```

I informed the developer of Fanboy's Annoyances about this error.
